data.title: Roc Nation Sports
data.text:
Louis Rees-Zammit signs with Roc Nation to boost NFL hopes

Former Welsh rugby union international aiming to land contract with NFL franchise after switching sports.

Roc Nation Sports expands to Brazil with TFM Agency acquisition

Alan Redmond, EVP and global head of football, says agency can provide quality of service unique to Brazilian market.

Ryder Cup enlists support of Roc Nation talent to reach new audiences

Agency's talent, including DJ Khaled, will feature and create content for the tournament.

Kevin De Bruyne lands McDonald’s endorsement deal

Manchester City legend and his wife will front family-focused campaigns in Belgium.

Rugby World Cup organisers ‘turned down major opening event’, says Roc Nation Sports president

Michael Yormark claims that rugby union needs to cater to new audiences to become more commercially viable.

United Rugby Championship names OFX as currency exchange partner

Foreign exchange brand looking to raise its profile in Europe.
